infos.value: The territory of Fennes lies due north of here.
So the hospitality of Leonis was for naught?
King Oelde, you have our deepest gratitude. Alas...
Enough. There's no need for that.
The relationship between Fennes and my beloved Leonis remains at odds.
If Lady Machérie were to wed into Fennes, it would doom us to a relationship of hostility as well.
Stop this madness at once and put your swords away.
Lady Machérie... The day must wear on you.
